techmeme.title: Study: US kids who said their social media, phone, or video game use was "addictive" were 2x-3x more likely to have thoughts of suicide or self-harm by age 14 (Ellen Barry/New York Times)
Q&A with Hugging Face Chief Ethics Scientist Margaret Mitchell on aligning AI development with human needs, the "illusion of consensus" around AGI, and more (Melissa Heikkilä/Financial Times)
SoftBank-backed Spotter, which fronts cash to YouTubers for a cut of revenue, is facing significant challenges due to YouTube's shift toward Shorts, and more (Aisha Counts/Bloomberg)
Report: Google's move from Samsung to TSMC for the Tensor G5 chip in the upcoming Pixel 10 series was a "shock" and a wake-up call for Samsung's foundry efforts (Ben Schoon/9to5Google)
White House crypto and AI czar David Sacks says China has grown adept at evading US export controls and is at most two years behind US chip design capabilities (Jackie Davalos/Bloomberg)
